notes:
Went 10-0 from legend 2 to king of games, it was the toughest season to date. Faced a lot of mirror matches and OTK'd 3 of them only because of Nobleman, Nobleman was MVP! taking out those floodgates and econs. I'd run 3 nobles if I had another. Better play them before the nerf.
I took out a Benten cause the 3rd one bricked me a lot.
